articles.title: Hear what Steve Bannon said about Nikki Haley as Trump's possible VP | CNN Politics
articles.description: Donald Trump Jr. and Steve Bannon dismissed the idea of Nikki Haley as a possible 2024 vice presidential candidate for Donald Trump. Chief National Affairs Correspondent Jeff Zeleny weighs in.

articles.title: ANALYSIS | What to expect from Doug Ford and Ontario politics in 2024 | CBC News
articles.description: The new year brings new opportunities for Premier Doug Ford to try to move past the controversies that plagued his government in 2023, but he'll be facing a new political threat in the form of Ontario Liberal leader Bonnie Crombie.
articles.content:

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Why Republican chatter about potential pardons for Trump matters
articles.description: Presidential candidates don’t usually have to talk about whether they’d issue pardons for a rival. In 2024, Republican politics is ... different.

articles.author: Mint
articles.title: ‘Canadian politics have given space to Khalistani forces’: EAM Jaishankar on India-Canada relations | Mint - Mint
articles.description: S Jaishankar in an interview with ANI expressed concern over Khalistani forces being given space in Canadian politics and engaging in activities that harm bilateral relations. He emphasized that these actions are detrimental to both India and Canada.
